parties: Ann and Craig BARTHOLOMEW, on behalf of their son, Jonathan BARTHOLOMEW, and the League of Women Voters of Pennsylvania, on behalf of its Members v. Constance B. opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 26th day of February, 1990, the Application for Reconsideration is denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:
